ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of May 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased and consolidated for clarity, is:
Whether provisions in a will bequeathing property to a beneficiary subject to the condition that the beneficiary pays all dividends on a portion of the property to a third party for life created a trust for the third party’s benefit, or a creditor/debtor relationship.
